text: Ra yasakarana pani ki jasala'i jnana pradana gari'eko cha, tiniharu visvasa garun ki yo tapa'iko palanakartako tarphabatai nai satya cha, . Atah uniharu yasamathi imana lya'un ra uniharuka hrdaya allahako agadi natamastaka ho'un ra juna manisaharule imana lya'eka chan, allahale uniharula'i sojho batotira marganirdesita gardacha
